ALES
Class Creature

java.lang.Object
  ALES.Creature
Direct Known Subclasses:
Barrier, Carnivore, Herbivore
public class Creature
extends java.lang.Object

Version:
0.1 This is the base creature type. All creatures should be derived from this class.
Author:
Mike Balaun, Ed Bullwinkel, John Daigle, Larry Eisenstein
